title: How is Nate Cain’s son in Emmerdale and who is Nathan Dingle?
text:
Nate’s true identity was revealed tonight. (Picture: Amy Brammall/ITV)

Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) reveals that he is Cain Dingle’s (Jeff Hordley) son is tonight’s explosive episode of Emmerdale.

After the boat explosion leaves three Emmerdale characters for dead as a result of Cain’s murderous revenge plot which has dramatic consequences, the revelation from Nate adds further fuel to the fire.

But who is Nate, Cain’s long lost son in Emmerdale and who is Cain’s relative Nathan who was mentioned in tonight’s episode?

Who is Nate, Cain’s son in Emmerdale?

A newbie to Emmerdale earlier this year, Nate has been getting up to all sorts of trouble when it comes to coming in between Cain and his wife Moira (Natalie J Robb) and seducing various women in the Yorkshire Dales including Amy Wyatt (Natalie Ann Jamieson) and Tracy Metcalfe (Amy Walsh).

Nate first entered the soap over the summer as the guy Rhona Goskirk (Zoe Henry) had kissed on a night out in Hotten. He got a job at Butler’s farm but was quickly fired when Rhona’s boyfriend Pete found out the truth about her kiss with him.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Subsequently Nate got a job working for Moira, which seemed to suit the hunky farmhand quite well, as it gave him a perfect excuse to meddle in the lives of Cain and Moira.

Nate’s vendetta against Cain and intent to destroy his marriage to Moira has become more and more evident for some time and now we know it is because Nate is the Emmerdale bad boy’s long lost son.

Who is Nathan Dingle?

Nathan Dingle gets a mention in Emmerdale tonight, which is the first time he’s been mentioned since 1995.

His name was last brought up when Tina Dingle mentioned that she had a brother named Nathan whilst in the Woolpack over two decades ago.

Nathan is the son of Zak and Nellie Dingle, counting Butch, Ben and Sam as siblings as well as Tina – making Cain and Belle his half-siblings.

Tina mentions in that scene from 1995 that Nathan is married and lives in London, although because he is stuck up and ashamed of his roots, his family had shunned him and not spoken to him since his wedding.

Not much is known about Nathan Dingle other than that and the character has never appeared on screen in Emmerdale – at least not yet anyway.

Emmerdale airs weeknights on ITV at 7pm.

description: Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) revealed that he is Cain Dingle's (Jeff Hordley) son is tonight’s explosive (literally) episode of Emmerdale.
